name: The 5th Age
description:
Hello! I’m Jakalair and I’m making The 5th Age, a RPG set inside a fledgling MMO full of NPCs run by different AIs. The 5th Age V 0.1.03

You play multiple characters during this game, but will spend most of the time as a town guard from the first village in the game.  Begin by rescuing your fellow NPCs, and then get ready to help the new players who will be showing up the following day. There are 4 different in-game character options,  in-game tutorials that can get turned on and off, and a whole lot more coming in the year 2023.

__________________________________________________________

This game will bounce back and forth between the physical world and the in-game one. It will span from pre-launch into the future.  

_________________________________________________________

The picture of servers in the cover image is from commons.wikimedia.org used under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0
